name: sparely
content:
sparely adverb
(NOT DECORATED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a plain way, without unnecessary details or decoration: Her books are so sparely written that the economy of her writing is often breathtaking. The apartment was furnished sparely but elegantly.
More examplesFewer examplesThe figures in his illustrations are beautifully but sparely drawn.The statements were made sparely and skilfully.By the end of this sparely told story, all that is left is a feeling of sadness.The background of the painting is sparely outlined, but the foreground contains more detail.

sparely adverb
(THIN)
in a way that is tall and thin: He was a tall, sparely built man with a bald head. The weightlifters were big fellows, while the runners were built more sparely.
